channel.title: Comments on: This is how the match started. Isn’t there any kind of autobalance plugin running on the servers?
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Free-dose-chips
item.dc:creator: Free-dose-chips
item.description: Autobalance? Whats that? I only play Battlefield games and Ive never heard of such a thing.
item.content:encoded: Autobalance? Whats that? I only play Battlefield games and Ive never heard of such a thing.

item.title: By: qlimaxmito
item.dc:creator: qlimaxmito
item.description:
The game makes a weak attempt at evening teams right at the end of the round, before players are even able to disconnect from the server and a full minute before the beginning of the next round.
After this no other balancing efforts take place, so the game will happily start the match even with 32v0.
item.content:encoded:
The game makes a weak attempt at evening teams right at the end of the round, before players are even able to disconnect from the server and a full minute before the beginning of the next round.

After this no other balancing efforts take place, so the game will happily start the match even with 32v0.

item.title: By: realparkingbrake
item.dc:creator: realparkingbrake
item.description:
EA made it so third party server control software would no longer work in BF games beginning with BF1. So all the various balance plug-ins available for server operators up to BF4 don't work in BF1 or BFV--of course BFV also lacks rented servers.
Brilliant move, one of EA's best.
item.content:encoded:
EA made it so third party server control software would no longer work in BF games beginning with BF1. So all the various balance plug-ins available for server operators up to BF4 don’t work in BF1 or BFV–of course BFV also lacks rented servers.

Brilliant move, one of EA’s best.

item.title: By: jaymo7288
item.dc:creator: jaymo7288
item.description: That was me and my buddy all night last night. I'll be glad when 2042 drops so I can uninstall
item.content:encoded: That was me and my buddy all night last night. I’ll be glad when 2042 drops so I can uninstall

item.title: By: karlman1
item.dc:creator: karlman1
item.description:
Funny how DICE was intelligent enough to have autobalancing 15 years ago when BF2 came out and then as time went on they went dumb and forgot how to make it work.
This crap made me quit playing, half of the rounds I was in were so hilariously lopsided. Like, I want to play 32v32, not the entire US military vs goddamn New Guinea.
item.content:encoded:
Funny how DICE was intelligent enough to have autobalancing 15 years ago when BF2 came out and then as time went on they went dumb and forgot how to make it work.

This crap made me quit playing, half of the rounds I was in were so hilariously lopsided. Like, I want to play 32v32, not the entire US military vs goddamn New Guinea.
